title: Search and research: an impression of the building research establishment
creator_credit: John Durst, Rayant Pictures and Tom Williamson
brief_description: Shows the work of the Building Research Establishment, which provides a technical advisory service for the construction industry both in the U.K. and overseas. Shows some of the Establishment’s projects, including the detailed study of building materials, research into the environmental aspects of the growth of new towns, and the study of resources to improve the utilisation of building materials and labour.
